assets.description: Inspired the amazing works of Guido Daniele. Click3x was commissioned by Sesame Street workshop to create two short films teaching young viewers about the letters T and Z.  Through the use of VO and the make up talents of Derrick Little, we were able to create a fun film having the children figure out the animal forming on a hand.
assets.title: Sesame Street Hand Turkey
